response.original_title: from a dog’s point of view
response.overview: The short 3d animation film "FROM A DOG'S POINT OF VIEW" , is a silent sad-emotional film as it tells us the story of a dog and a child who grow up together.We see the dog from a young age looking out the window wanting to show us what a beautiful day it is to go out and play with his best friend the child, who follows him.But as the years go by, the child grows up and has other problems and concerns in his daily life that distance him from his dog.But as a man grows, so does a dog, and we all know that the dog will not be there forever.
response.title: from a dog’s point of view
